text: $ULTA now 463. My trade idea was to get half that ER drop back. We're there. I'm mostly out now. It doesn't seem like a great moment to be a company with shelves and inventory. It can probably get to the 480s this week. I'm just cautious. A piece of the move is good enough.
author: Market Monk
